description.zh: Memos 是一个现代化、开源、自托管的知识管理与笔记记录平台，专为注重隐私的用户和组织设计。它提供轻量级但功能强大的解决方案，支持 Markdown 并可在多平台使用。
description.en: Memos is a modern, open-source, self-hosted knowledge management and note-taking platform. It is designed for privacy-conscious users and organizations who want full control over their data. The platform offers a lightweight yet powerful solution with Markdown support and cross-platform accessibility.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 通过自托管架构和完整数据所有权保障用户隐私
- 轻量高效，专为笔记记录和知识管理优化
- 开源无授权费用，拥有活跃的社区开发支持

## 功能列表:

- 支持本地数据库存储，实现数据完全自主控制
- 自托管架构，可全面掌控基础设施
- 运行时无需任何第三方服务或云端连接
- 流畅的文本输入体验，内容即时保存
- 完整的 Markdown 支持，包括语法高亮
- 支持图片、链接及嵌入式多媒体内容
- 基于 Go 构建的高性能后端服务
- 使用 React.js 的现代响应式前端界面
- 部署轻便，系统资源占用低
- 支持 Linux、macOS、Windows 及容器化环境
- 可定制服务器品牌标识、主题与界面元素
- 提供 RESTful API 用于第三方集成
- 支持多种数据库（SQLite、PostgreSQL、MySQL）
- MIT 开源协议，源代码完全开放
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Prioritizes user privacy with self-hosted architecture and complete data ownership
- Lightweight and high-performance solution for note-taking and knowledge management
- Open-source with zero licensing costs and active community development

## Features:

- Complete data ownership with local database storage
- Self-hosted architecture with full infrastructure control
- No external dependencies required for runtime operations
- Streamlined text input with immediate save functionality
- Comprehensive Markdown support with syntax highlighting
- Rich media integration including images, links, and embedded content
- High-performance backend built with Go
- Modern, responsive frontend built with React.js
- Lightweight deployment with minimal system requirements
- Cross-platform compatibility with Linux, macOS, Windows, and container environments
- Customizable branding, themes, and UI elements
- RESTful API for third-party integrations
- Multi-database support (SQLite, PostgreSQL, MySQL)
- MIT licensed with full source code availability
